main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam

Class BookingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.vlashchevskyi.exam.BookingSystem

  • public class BookingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    BookingSystem class receives booking requests from console or file, handles and prints them as a schedule.

    Multiple or one thread mode is provided. BookingSystem can be switched to different thread modes automatically to provide maximum performance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookingSystem()
      Constructs an instance with default settings.
      BookingSystem(MultiThreadMode mode)
      Constructs an instance and configure it according to provided thread mode.

        Returns:
